briefTitle: A Single-arm Study to Evaluate Safety and Effectiveness of VX-548 for Acute Pain
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Single-arm Study Evaluating the Safety and Effectiveness of VX-548 for Acute Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of VX-548 in treating acute pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed by Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
